Backgrounds

Backgrounds provide pre-defined coloured backgrounds that adjust foreground text and link colours appropriately. You can also use the helper .bg-light and .bg-dark classes to only adjust the font and link colours if you want to provide your on background colours.

Note: For blocks of content with coloured backgrounds, use slabs.

bg-white
